LanguageData.RimPlas_GhostGear.label: Ghost Gear
LanguageData.RimPlas_GhostGear.description: Grants the ability to make complex graphene based equipment.
LanguageData.RimPlas_GGCaltrops.label: Caltrops (Ghost Gear)
LanguageData.RimPlas_GGCaltrops.description: Grants the ability to make Ghost Gear Caltrops.
LanguageData.RimPlas_NerveToxin.label: Nanite nerve toxin
LanguageData.RimPlas_NerveToxin.description: Grants the ability to make nanite nerve toxins. These can be used to attack neurological functioning. Can be mitigated with toxic immunity.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Haywire.label: Haywire Tech
LanguageData.RimPlas_Haywire.description: Grants the ability to make haywire tech. Haywire tech can be used to disable and stun mechanoids.
